description: NDAC Radio FM Active alarms dashboard

panels.description: Provides the count of critical alarms

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:critical

panels.title: Critical Alarms

panels.description: Provides the count of major alarms

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:major

panels.title: Major Alarms

panels.description: Provides the count of minor alarms

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:minor

panels.title: Minor Alarms

panels.description: Provides the count of warning alarms

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:warning

panels.title: Warning Alarms

panels.description:
This table will show all Service Impacting active alarms that are raised across all edges enodeB's.

Note: Turnoff the refresh timer when moving to different page.

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND ((fm_data.specific_problem:6825) OR (fm_data.specific_problem:7655) OR (fm_data.specific_problem:61631))

panels.title: Service Impacting Alarms

panels.description:
This table will show all active alarms that are critical across all edges enodeB's

Note: Turnoff the refresh timer when moving to different page.

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:critical

panels.title: Critical Active Alarms

panels.description:
This table will show all active alarms that are major across all edges enodeB's

Note: Turnoff the refresh timer when moving to different page.

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:major

panels.title: Major Active Alarms

panels.description:
This table will show all active alarms that are minor across all edges enodeB's

Note: Turnoff the refresh timer when moving to different page.

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:minor

panels.title: Minor Active Alarms

panels.description:
This table will show all active alarms that are warning across all edges enodeB's

Note: Turnoff the refresh timer when moving to different page.

targets.query: fm_data.alarm_state:ACTIVE AND fm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND fm_data_source.dn:$apid AND fm_data.severity:warning

panels.title: Warning Active Alarms

title: NDAC Radio FM Alarms Active Dashboard
